workshoptitle: AI Services: Introduction to OCI Speech

tutorials.title: Introduction: OCI speech
tutorials.description: Learn how to generate text transcripts from audio files using OCI Speech

tutorials.title: Get started - Cloud login
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts

tutorials.title: Lab 0: Create a bucket and upload files
tutorials.description: Learn how to create an input bucket in object storage and upload files

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Transcribe audio with the console
tutorials.description: Learn how to transcribe audio files using oci console

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Access OCI speech with OCI SDKs (Optional)
tutorials.description: Learn how to access OCI Speech with Speech SDKs

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Access OCI speech with OCI CLI
tutorials.description: Learn how to access OCI Speech with CLI

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Access OCI speech with REST APIs (Optional)
tutorials.description: Learn how to access OCI Speech with REST API.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Use OCI speech with datascience notebook session (Optional)
tutorials.description: Learn how to access OCI Speech in DataScience Notebook Session.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Enable notifications for OCI speech transcription jobs
tutorials.description: Learn how to use e-mail notification feature in OCI Speech.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Trigger functions for OCI speech transcription jobs (Optional)
tutorials.description: Learn how to use Faas feature in OCI Speech.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
